metadata.title: CVE-2018-16430 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
GNU Libextractor through 1.7 has an out-of-bounds read vulnerability inEXTRACTOR_zip_extract_method() in zip_extractor.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-16430` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

extract - 1:1.3-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
libextractor3 - 1:1.3-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libextractor package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:1.3-1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
